description: TableMetadata is the metadata for tables.

checkConstraints.description: The check_constraints is the list of check constraints in a table.

collation.description: The collation is the collation of a table.

columns.description: The columns is the ordered list of columns in a table.

comment.description: The comment is the comment of a table.

createOptions.description: The create_options is the create option of a table.

dataFree.description: The data_free is the estimated free data size of a table.

dataSize.description: The data_size is the estimated data size of a table.

engine.description: The engine is the engine of a table.

foreignKeys.description: The foreign_keys is the list of foreign keys in a table.

indexSize.description: The index_size is the estimated index size of a table.

indexes.description: The indexes is the list of indexes in a table.

name.description: The name is the name of a table.

partitions.description: The partitions is the list of partitions in a table.

rowCount.description: The row_count is the estimated number of rows of a table.

skipDump.description: Whether to skip this table during schema dump operations.

sortingKeys.description:
The sorting_keys is a tuple of column names or arbitrary expressions. ClickHouse specific field.
 Reference: https://clickhouse.com/docs/en/engines/table-engines/mergetree-family/mergetree#order_by

triggers.description: The triggers is the list of triggers associated with the table.

title: Table Metadata
